CustomField.description: A check in this field indicates the contact should receive a .DAT file containing new “rate” information based on the APR % increase applicable to their StarTrack products. (Relates to the APR object developed by SalesForce as part of the “SalesLogix project”)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Send this contact the updated .DAT file containing the new rates based on the APR % increase applicable to their StarTrack products.
CustomField.label: Updated Cost Calculator File (StarTrack)
